code:
-spec maximum_length(S :: unicode:unicode_binary()) -> integer().
maximum_length(S) ->
  MaxLen = byte_size(S),
  lists:foldl(fun(Length, Acc) ->
                case lists:foldl(fun(Char, {PrevChar, Count, MaxCount}) ->
                                   if
                                     Char =:= PrevChar -> {Char, Count + 1, max(Count + 1, MaxCount)};
                                     true -> {Char, 1, MaxCount}
                                   end
                                 end, {0, 0, 0}, binary_to_list(S)) of
                  {_, _, MaxCount} when MaxCount >= 3 -> max(Acc, Length);
                  _ -> Acc
                end
              end, -1, lists:seq(1, MaxLen)).
